# 水平垂直居中

<div class="parent">
    <div class="box">哈哈哈</div>
</div>

html,body{
  height: 100%;
}
.parent {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}

# 1. margin auto

  • 定宽高
.box{
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  background-color: coral;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  margin: auto;
}

# 2. 定位

.box{
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  background-color: greenyellow;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-top: -100px;
  margin-left: -100px;
}

# 3. transform: translate(-50%, -50%)

  • 不知道子元素的宽高
.box{
  background-color: green;
  position: absolute;
  left: 50%;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

# 4. flex布局

.parent{
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

# 5. table布局

  • 父元素必须定宽高，兼容性好
.parent{
  height: 300px;
  width: 300px;
  border: 1px solid red;
  display: table-cell;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: middle;

}
.box{
  display: inline-block;
  background-color: red;
}

← 等比缩放 flex布局 →
